content:
Github project forking the smart-on-fhir site for Australian content; this collects together discussions so far but is a work in progress; send your github ids if you feel the urge to work on something
https://github.com/fhir-au/smart-on-fhir.github.io

The wiki content has also been shifted to github to keep things together and avoid some changes about to happen with HL7 AU wikis - again github ids needed to be able to edit content https://github.com/fhir-au/smart-on-fhir.github.io/wiki/fhir-au
Publication of the site can be seen at http://fhir-au.azurewebsites.net/ went for a green banner so one can notice when you've wandered into the smart-on-fhir USA site

A first daft of a proposed HL7 Australia Profile is now available here:
https://confluence.hl7australia.com/display/PA/FHIR+SMART+App+Launch+Australian+Profile+-+EHR+Launch
Along with a walkthrough illustrating it in action:
https://confluence.hl7australia.com/display/PA/FHIR+SMART+App+Launch+Walkthrough

Telstra Health is implementing this in Communicare as a host, and the NCSR as a SMART App and are currently in review, and happy to discuss with other vendors to integrate these.
(and also several other projects)

There are quite a few "Implementer Questions" in the profile, and seeking lots of feedback.
This will be on tomorrow's HL7 Australia Patient Administration Agenda
